1010100001110110 1000100111010010 1 -> sum: 0011001001001001, cout: 1
0111100100100001 1000000111010010 1 -> sum: 1111101011110100, cout: 0
0100000100001010 1000011111101101 1 -> sum: 1100100011111000, cout: 0

0000001100011111 0101011010000011 0 -> sum: 0101100110100010, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
